Class DisplayGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.funzio.pure2D.BaseDisplayObject
      • com.funzio.pure2D.containers.DisplayGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cacheable, Container, Contentable, DisplayObject, InvalidateFlags, Manipulatable, Touchable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, GridGroup, LinearGroup, LineArray, MaskGroup, NovaGroup, Page, SparkGroup, Wheel3D

    public class DisplayGroup
extends BaseDisplayObject
implements Container, Cacheable, Touchable

        public void setCacheEnabled(boolean cacheEnabled)
